price: 48. And the evils of that which they earned will become apparent to them, and that which they used to mock at will encircle them.
arabic: وَبَدَا لَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَحَاقَ بِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
